Add Hook.description: Register MOD$Func hook for use with __resolve_hook() intrinsic.

Add Hook Chain.description: Register MOD$Func's attach "MOD$Func" "hook" chain with __resolve_hook() intrinsic.

Attach.description: Rewrite calls and references to MODULE$Function to go through hook(). Preserves MODULE$Function in hook().

DFR.description: (PIC only) Sets default dynamic function resolution resolver function. Rewrites MODULE$Function references in PIC to call resolver. ror13 method passes ror13 module and function hashes to resolver. strings method passes module and function stack strings to resolver.

DFR Ext.description: (PIC only) Set dynamic function resolution resolver function for Win32 APIs from MODULE1 and MODULE2. This resolver has priority over the default resolver.

Export Func.description: (PICO only) Export function from PICO and generate __tag_function intrinsic (used with PicoGetExport to find func pointer).

Filter Hooks.description: Walk imports of $DLL or $OBJECT and remove registered hooks for APIs not in import table.

Link Function.description: Link (code) bytes on the stack to function symbol in object on stack.

Make COFF.description: Turn contents on stack into a COFF-exporter object.

Make Object.description: Turn contents on stack into a PICO-exporter object.

Make PIC.description: Turn contents on stack into PIC-exporter object.

Merge Library.description: Merges each COFF file within zip archive to object on stack.

Run Spec.description: Run another .spec, using the same target, $VARs, and stack as the current script. Accepts positional arguments, passed as %1, %2, etc.
